API.predict¶

API.predict(model_name, optimal_threshold, Var_1, Var_2, Var_3, Var_4, Var_5, Var_6, Var_7, Var_8)[source]¶

Predicts fraud for a new customer

Todo

parse more elegantly kwargs

Parameters

  • model_name – A model name to store the resulting model

  • optimal_threshold – A threshold to override the calculated one

  • Var_1 – Description of Var_1.

  • Var_2 – Description of Var_2.

  • Var_3 – Description of Var_3.

  • Var_4 – Description of Var_4.

  • Var_5 – Description of Var_5.

  • Var_7 – Description of Var_7.

  • Var_8 – Description of Var_8. risky.

Returns

prediction as a score
